interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Uptown Cosmeceuticals Eyelash Growth Serum Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply 3.5ml Review Date: 2016/07/03 Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {} Review Text: Still waiting for the results. I don't have terribly thick eyebrows so I wanted some of this to try out. I've been applying it at bedtime and before I put my makeup on. It is a nice light viscous oil that doesn't weigh down my brow hairs. Perhaps knowing that I've put something on my eyebrows makes me not fuss with them as much. Time will tell, but so far, I like it. I can use my Anastasia BH brow kit over this and it doesn't change the application at all (I dust a bit of setting powder on before)
I like it and will update if there is anything significant to tell!
If you feel that my review was helpful, please let me know by selecting “Yes” from the options below. Even though I received this product at lower cost, I am not obligated in any way to review positively, my opinion has not been influenced by outside sources in any manner. I am not affiliated with this company and I never promise to provide a positive review when offered. I test the product thoroughly and do my best to provide detailed reviews to other Amazon customers so they may make informed decisions. My hope is that these reviews are helpful to others. Review Title: Seems to be working for my brow hair! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Vitamin C Serum 2 fl. oz with L'Ascorbic Acid - Facial Skin Care & Anti Aging Serum That Helps Skin Brightening, Repair Sun Damage, Fade Age Spots, Dark Circles, Wrinkles & Fine Lines {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Weight': '0.31 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 3.46 x 2.2 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '602519445008'} Very light feeling, clear serum that sinks into my skin with no stickiness at all. It doesn't feel 'tacky' on my skin, but I'm so dry that it just soaked it right up!
The glass dropper is long enough to reach the bottom of the glass jar. Looks and feels very 'vintage, like something off of an Apothecary's shelf. If you're not a fan of the dropper, you can just use the bottle top that it comes with.
I didn't notice any discernable scent to this. Not floral, not perfumey, just clean. As soon as I rubbed it in, there was NO smell left on my hands. It just disappeared. This is one for the beauty stand. Very good quality and I'm happy to have been able to test this at a reduced price from the company. So light and soaked right into my skin Uptown Cosmeceuticals Eyelash Growth Serum Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply 3.5ml {} Still waiting for the results. I don't have terribly thick eyebrows so I wanted some of this to try out. I've been applying it at bedtime and before I put my makeup on. It is a nice light viscous oil that doesn't weigh down my brow hairs. Perhaps knowing that I've put something on my eyebrows makes me not fuss with them as much. Time will tell, but so far, I like it. I can use my Anastasia BH brow kit over this and it doesn't change the application at all (I dust a bit of setting powder on before)
I like it and will update if there is anything significant to tell!
If you feel that my review was helpful, please let me know by selecting “Yes” from the options below. Even though I received this product at lower cost, I am not obligated in any way to review positively, my opinion has not been influenced by outside sources in any manner. I am not affiliated with this company and I never promise to provide a positive review when offered. I test the product thoroughly and do my best to provide detailed reviews to other Amazon customers so they may make informed decisions. My hope is that these reviews are helpful to others. Seems to be working for my brow hair!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Key Preferences:**
  - Enjoys lightweight skincare products that absorb quickly without a sticky residue.
  - Values products that help with hydration and skin repair, particularly for dry skin.
  - Prefers minimalist scents in skincare, with a preference for clean, non-perfumed options.
  - Appreciates quality design elements, especially vintage or classic aesthetics in packaging.
  - Open to trying new products, particularly when offered at a reduced price.

- **Behavior Patterns:**
  - Engages with skincare focused on anti-aging properties, highlighting a commitment to addressing signs of aging such as wrinkles and dark circles.
  - Tends to evaluate product quality significantly, as seen in detailed reviews that highlight both positives and personal experiences.
  - Displays a thoughtful approach in sharing experiences, indicating a desire to inform others about product effectiveness.
  - Recently expressed a keen interest in enhancing brow hair growth, noting the importance of product texture that does not weigh down hair, and maintaining an informed review style that emphasizes thorough testing and unbiased evaluations.

Overall, the user exhibits a strong interest in effective, aesthetically pleasing skincare solutions that prioritize hydration, anti-aging benefits, and personal grooming enhancements. Their detailed reviews indicate a commitment to providing valuable insights for fellow consumers.
